diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $13$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $29$ units.
The length of the line $CD$ is $6$ units.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $C$ and $B$.
The line $AD$ is perpendicular to the line $CD$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AD$, forming a triangle $ABD$.
There are lines $BC$, $BD$, $CD$, forming a triangle $BCD$.
